entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -8.1°C

Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %

Dewpoint: -13.6°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
